amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, prohibits any order, opinion, or record of the court from being sealed or subjected to a protective order unless the court finds that the sealing or protective order is narrowly tailored, consistent with the protection of public health and safety, and is in the public interest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which prevents records of class action cases from being sealed, if doing so harms the public health and safety.
